synopsis.text: White waves crash against the hull as Japan's naval fleet sails into the Atlantic Ocean in "Kyokujitsu no Kantai," daring to challenge the might of the Kriegsmarine in their own territory. With the declaration of war by Germany, the Japanese navy rises to the occasion, establishing a new maritime route that connects Japan and Great Britain via the North Pole. As the Germans launch a precise attack on the White House, the US finds itself once again drawn into the conflict, aligning with Japan. Meanwhile, the Japanese fleet stands as a bulwark against a German invasion of Britain, proving their mettle in this thrilling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
